application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
Works agreed to tree labelled T3
Works agreed to tree labelled T4
Works agreed to tree labelled T5
Works agreed to tree labelled T6
Works agreed to tree labelled T7
Works agreed to tree labelled T8
Works agreed to tree labelled T9
description: REAR GARDENCherry (Prunus spp)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 1.5-2m to tidy and contain, giving the adjacent apple tree some space. Final height 4m and width 2mApple (Malus domestica)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 0.5-1m to rebalance and give better form. Final height 3m and width 1.5mT3	Cherry (Prunus spp)	Self seeded cherry sapling. Fell to ground level and grub out stump.	T4	Plum (Prunus domestica)	Ailing Plum. Fell to ground level and grub out stump.	T5	Apple (Malus domestica) and Climbing Rose	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2-3m to contain and tidy. Leave climbing rose in but reduce it as part of the tree. Final height 5m and width 4m	T6	Box Elder (Acer negundo)	Tidy up old pruning cuts and remove unsightly pegs.Final height 3m and width 1.5mT7	Narrow Leaf Laurel	Cut hard back to flowerbed edge and trim remaining to tidy and shape.	T8	Magnolia - soulangeana	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2m to tidy and contain. Final height 4m and width 3mT9	Yew (Taxus baccata)	Trim off new growth to match neighbours side. Final height 4m and width 4m
